rows.food_types_description_text: These foods give us energy to help us 'go' and be active
These are foods that help build and repair our bodies
rows.Examples: Beans; Lentils; Eggs; Milk; Chicken; Fish

rows.food_types_description_text: Foods that improve our health and protect our bodies from getting diseases
rows.Examples: Spinach, Kales, Watermelon, Orange, Pawpaw; Lettuce; Pumkin
